title: Careful guys, Riot maybe banning players for speaking badly about the HUD
body:
Beware, it looks like I was recently banned for talking badly about the HUD interface. It was included in my ban e-mail as part of the chat that was deemed toxic (not sure why it would be included otherwise). Looks like if you disagree, bad things might happen, just warning other players out there.

proof: 
http://imgur.com/NNFzcza
